issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
When stopping the eucalyptus-cloud service the following warnings are logged:

{code}
2015-01-29 15:33:03  WARN | SHUTDOWN:Eucalyptus.bootstrap:WebServices - Waiting for pool to shutdown.
2015-01-29 15:33:03  WARN | java.lang.Thread.getStackTrace(Thread.java:1589)
                          |             com.eucalyptus.system.Threads$ThreadPool.<init>(Threads.java:240)
                          |             com.eucalyptus.system.Threads$ThreadPool.<init>(Threads.java:226)

                          |             com.eucalyptus.system.Threads.lookup(Threads.java:172)
                          |             com.eucalyptus.ws.WebServices.clientChannelFactory(WebServices.java:291)

                          |             com.eucalyptus.util.fsm.TransitionImpl.leave(TransitionImpl.java:218)
                          |             com.eucalyptus.util.fsm.AtomicMarkedState$ActiveTransition.leave(AtomicMarkedState.java:524)
                          |             com.eucalyptus.util.fsm.AtomicMarkedState.afterLeave(AtomicMarkedState.java:342)
                          |             com.eucalyptus.util.fsm.AtomicMarkedState.transition(AtomicMarkedState.java:185)
                          |             com.eucalyptus.util.fsm.Automata$1.call(Automata.java:141)
                          |             com.eucalyptus.util.fsm.Automata$1.call(Automata.java:126)
                          |             com.eucalyptus.util.async.Futures$3.call(Futures.java:194)
                          |             com.eucalyptus.util.async.Futures$3.call(Futures.java:181)

                          |             com.eucalyptus.util.async.Futures$3.call(Futures.java:194)
                          |             com.eucalyptus.util.async.Futures$3.call(Futures.java:181)
                          |             com.eucalyptus.cluster.Cluster.start(Cluster.java:899)
                          |             com.eucalyptus.cluster.ClusterBuilder.fireStart(ClusterBuilder.java:125)
                          |             com.eucalyptus.component.ServiceTransitions$ServiceLocalTransitionCallbacks$4.fire(ServiceTransitions.java:667)
                          |             com.eucalyptus.component.ServiceTransitions.processTransition(ServiceTransitions.java:360)
                          |             com.eucalyptus.component.ServiceTransitions.access$000(ServiceTransitions.java:123)
                          |             com.eucalyptus.component.ServiceTransitions$TransitionActions.leave(ServiceTransitions.java:412)
                          |             com.eucalyptus.component.ServiceTransitions$TransitionActions.leave(ServiceTransitions.java:379)
                          |             com.eucalyptus.util.fsm.TransitionImpl.leave(TransitionImpl.java:218)
                          |             com.eucalyptus.util.fsm.AtomicMarkedState$ActiveTransition.leave(AtomicMarkedState.java:524)
                          |             com.eucalyptus.util.fsm.AtomicMarkedState.afterLeave(AtomicMarkedState.java:342)
                          |             com.eucalyptus.util.fsm.AtomicMarkedState.transition(AtomicMarkedState.java:185)
                          |             com.eucalyptus.component.ServiceState.transition(ServiceState.java:136)
                          |             com.eucalyptus.component.ServiceState.transition(ServiceState.java:83)
                          |             com.eucalyptus.util.fsm.Automata$1.call(Automata.java:141)
                          |             com.eucalyptus.util.fsm.Automata$1.call(Automata.java:126)
                          |             com.eucalyptus.util.async.Futures$3.call(Futures.java:194)
                          |             com.eucalyptus.util.async.Futures$3.call(Futures.java:181)
                          |             com.eucalyptus.component.ServiceTransitions.executeTransition(ServiceTransitions.java:317)
                          |             com.eucalyptus.component.ServiceTransitions.pathTo(ServiceTransitions.java:183)

                          |             com.eucalyptus.component.Topology$8.call(Topology.java:1127)

                          |             com.eucalyptus.system.Threads$Queue.run(Threads.java:752)
                          |             java.util.concurrent.Executors$RunnableAdapter.call(Executors.java:471)
{code}

Thread pools should shutdown cleanly when stopping the service and there are no requests being processed.
fields.summary: Thread pool warnings logged when stopping eucalyptus-cloud service

comments.body: Thread pools now shutdown cleanly on service stop.

Verified.  I did not see this message during shutdown.  Current shutdown logs below.
